data.title: About Us :: Zelena Inc.
data.text:
About Us

Zelena, Inc., is a privately held company. The founders of the firm come from various horizons and have been active in the IT field and the software industry and since 1980. Their expertise and experience has lead them to select the most innovative yet complementary solutions available on the market today.

Zelena is active in North America & Canada and represents advanced technology solutions from companies like International Software Company, Netviewer GmbH, Angler Solutions, Ikan Group,

Our tools improve the productivity of software developers, the quality of the applications they develop, maintain the end users' core skills and enhance their knowledge within software and complex IT Systems.

Banks, utilities, insurance companies, healthcare providers, government, manufacturers and distributors share a common need to offer quick service with a personal touch. With quick access to the right information, people on the front lines can extend quality service. The solutions proposed by Zelena give our customers the ability to bring 'the right information to the right place at the right time'.

The solutions we propose have been selected from various Independent Software Vendors. Our partners are experts in their fields. They react to current needs but also anticipate future changes. This allows us to propose integrated, efficient, simplified and consistent solutions.

All of our products are available for a FREE 30 day trial. We can show you the ease of use of our solutions and prove how they pay for themselves by saving you time and money.
